name: Smock's Block
description:
Smock is suffering from a severe case of painter's block. He'll have to face his inner demons of creativity if he wants to finish his art project.

Harness the power of paint to battle against fearsome foes and solve puzzles while traversing the barren wasteland of Smock's inspiration. And maybe add some color to the environment while you're at it.

This game was made for Mini Jam 62. The theme was "Colors," and all animations were required to use no more than two frames.

Developed by:

Brian Dizon: Programming, Level Design, Enemy Models, Animation

Duncan Sparks: Programming, UI, Player/Environment Models, Sound

Riley Park: Particle Design

Rami Shreim: Title Artwork

Music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org
